name: christmas tea party
notes:
this mystery knit-along will end up with a pair of socks on christmas eve. there will be a new part released each day in december (1-24). the idea is to use leftover yarns, mini-skeins, or an advent calendar worth of yarns to knit these. that said, you could also have a lovely pair of socks with a single yarn. if you choose that option, your best plan would be to use a solid, semi-solid, or tonal yarn. 

**materials**: approximately 100 gms of fingering weight sock yarn. 

**gauge:** 8 sts and 11 rnds = 1 inch

**sizes:** 7 (8, 9, 10) inch circumference

this pattern is knit top down, with 12 parts per sock. as written, the 12 parts you will knit  are the cuff, 5 leg sections, the heel, 4 foot sections, and the toe. 

**note:** the two socks are different! you will get 12 parts for each sock. if you wish to knit identical socks, you can choose to knit days 1-12 or days 13-24.

if you are a determined toe-up knitter, you can certainly adapt the pattern.

pattern will update **every day** from december 1 to december 24, with each additional part added on to the original pattern.

mkal chatter will be found [here][1] in the [fgf: the socks group.][2]
